name: cgps-genotyphi
description: CGPS implementation of [Genotyphi by Kat Holt _et al_](https://github.com/katholt/genotyphi) for assembled genomes. Genotyphi is the implementation of the genotyping framework for _Salmonella_ Typhi by [Wong _et al_](https://www.nature.com/articles/ncomms12827/), which uses a curated set of mutations to assign strains to a particular labelled clade or subclade.
